column4: I have ubuntu 7.04 and it is not detecting my cd-r drive or digital camera
I'm not sure I know enough to diagnose your digicam, but I can probably help you with your CD-R.
Is your CD-R drive IDE or SATA or USB?
ok, thanks, my cd-rom is a memorex 52x
Okay. Do you know which channel it's in?
Choose Primary Master, Primary Slave, Secondary Master, or Secondary Slave.
Okay is it on the end of the IDE cable or in the middle?
What happens when you type sudo mount /dev/hdc /media/hdc
mount: mount point /media/hdc does not exist
Ok, i just put one in.
mount: block device /dev/hdc is write-protected, mounting read-only
Hmm. IDK much about the automounting feature.
YW. Maybe someone might have an idea.
